## Tasks:

* Install R and Rstudio on your machine. (mac, windows, linux)
* 



We will begin by opening Rstudio and installing and loading the package 'swirl'.

```{r}
install.packages('swirl')
library(swirl)
install_course_github("swirldev", "R_Programming_E")
swirl()
```

When prompted, choose "R programming E" > 1: Basic Building Blocks
